    void
    btnClickAddPlayer()
    Method to handle when the add player button is clicked If no team is registered yet, method will give alertbox and not register the player.
    void
    btnClickAddTeam()
    Method to handle when add team button is clicked If team is already registered, alertbox will display and team wont be registered.
    void
    btnClickClearPlayerField()
    Method to handle when the clear player button is clicked Clears all player information text fields.
    void
    btnRemovePlayer()
    A method to handle when the remove player button is clicked If no player is selected, alertbox will display and no player is removed.
    void

    A method to handle when the remove team button is clicked Removes the team.txt file and from teamNameList.
